backend/main.mo: IC canister implementing product, order, and config types with product filtering by style and default category listings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing UI theme updates and affected frontend files with metadata and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each main frontend file, components, and hooks in the storefront project.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS variables and dark‑mode values defining color tokens and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing header, hero, categories, products, sections, and footer with config loading and providers.
frontend/src/components/CartSheet.tsx: Cart side‑sheet with item list, quantity controls, checkout panel toggle, and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/CategoryShowcase: Category grid with icon and gradient maps enabling scroll navigation and playful card effects.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutPanel.ts: Checkout form handling order submission, cart data, validation, and confirmation UI.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedCollecti: Displays a grid of featured product collections with icons, gradients, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with brand info, navigation links, social area, and smooth-scroll handlers.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section showing brand visuals, headline, description, and scroll-to-products CTA.
frontend/src/components/NewsletterCTA.ts: Newsletter signup card with email input, form handling, and stylized presentation.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product display card with image, tags, price, stock badges, and actions for details and add-to-cart.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailDia: Modal showing detailed product info, allowing size/color selection and adding items to the cart with validation. Manages quantity, displays style tags, and handles out‑of‑stock states.
Displays product listings filtered by category and style, includes quick-add-to-cart and a detail dialog. Fetches products via queries and manages UI filters and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHeader: Renders the storefront header with navigation, search, account button, cart access, and a mobile menu. Scrolls to sections and displays cart item count.
Shows a grid of trust/brand highlights with icons and descriptions. Static marketing section emphasizing store benefits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes. Provides the actor instance and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking. Provides context for accessing identity across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching config, products, and placing orders using the actor. Also provides helpers for style labels and available style options.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, fonts, light/dark theme OKLCH color tokens, and some custom playful utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/state/cart.tsx: Implements a React context for cart state with item management, quantity updates, and totals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and plugins using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata and feature tracking for building the KSM Corporation storefront.
